Posts.Content: BEllen wrote: I am writing on behalf of a friend who is moving from hormonal treatments to chemo and wants to understand all of her options for the future.  She would like to find a doctor who has experimented with using medications in unconventional combinations or in new ways.  If anyone has any leads, we'd really appreciate it.  Best to you all,   Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: MD who is willing/able to use meds in unconventional ways BEllen BEllen
